annotation.text: THE ANALYSIS OF KNOWLEDGE WILL OCCUPY US UNTIL THE END OF THE THIRTEENTH LECTURE AND IS THE MOST DIFFICULT PART OF OUR WHOLE ENTERPRISE
annotation.origin_transcripts: THE ANIMAL OF KNOWLEDGE WILL OCCUPY US UNTIL THE END OF THE 13TH LECTURE AND IS THE MOST DIFFICULT PART OF OUR WHOLE ENTERPRISE

annotation.text: THEY MUST HAVE SOME CHARACTERISTIC WHICH MAKES US REGARD THEM AS REFERRING TO MORE OR LESS REMOTE PORTIONS OF THE PAST
annotation.origin_transcripts: THEY HAVE SOME CHARACTERISTIC WHICH MAKES US REGARD THEM AS REFERRING TO MORE LESS REMOTE PORTIONS OF THE PAST
